attributes.description:
If you are looking for a quality Pre-Owned Vehicle then look no further.  
Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.  Delivery can be arranged nationwide. Price excludes admin and delivery fee. Finance can be arranged on premises and trade- ins are welcome.
We at Wingfield Motors Bellville strive for perfection, so that you as the customer can make the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect vehicle to suit your needs so please do take a stroll on our showroom floor. 
We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.  
You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives, to help with all your vehicle requirements.

attributes.agent_name: Motus Ford Diep River Used Cars
attributes.description:
Balance of Active Service plan of 49months/61500km Scheduled Service Plan!! DEMO MODEL!!! ENQUIRE NOW and you will be connected to one of our professional sales executives who will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. ENQUIRE NOW and we will tailor make a finance package that will not only suite your need but you pocket too as we deal through all major finance institutions and will fight for the best rate in town. ALL TRADE INS WELCOME AND WE OFFER NATIONWIDE DELIVERY

Why Ford Approved
All our vehicles have passed our stringent 160-point check
160-point checks mean that you have peace of mind that all the vehicles listed here have been screened in order to meet our high standards of approval.

Our vehicles have a full-service history
None of our vehicles have been registered for more than 5 years old
Our vehicles have a maximum mileage of 120 000km
We get our cars’ mileage readings verified
Our vehicles come with the balance of Manufacturer’s Warranty - or a new warranty
The Balance of the Service Plan and Maintenance Plan is included
We offer Roadside Assistance for 12 months
We accept all trade-ins
We offer test drives on all our used vehicles
